translation.Name: Greece Note Operation Moirae
translation.Interactability_Text_Line_3: Escort convoy of (1)Chariot and (3)Cerberus to the designated position.
translation.Interactability_Text_Line_4: Await for retreat confirmation, or 3 hours, whichever comes first.
translation.Interactability_Text_Line_5: Upon confirmation release (6)Volleys of the experimental Th√°nato missiles on the horde.
